constituent: stuff up, soil, dirt, ground, true, truth, ten, needle, eye, tool, one, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: When we hear the world inlay, we usually think of setting precious stones in pieces of jewelery, but the primitive elements here suggest truth being inlaid in the soil. You might think instead of the cosmic wisdom that inlaid the truth of the universe in the stuff of the earth.
koohiiStory1: In a hole in the ground, the body of the victim was placed. And then the killer stuffed it up so that the truth would not be found out, he hoped.
koohiiStory2: I stuffed up his mouth with dirt to keep the truth from coming out.
kunYomi: は.まる、は.める、うず.める、しず.める、ふさ.ぐ
myStory: vào trong. sự thật đi vào trong lòng đất
words: to get into, to go into, to fit, to be fit for, to suit, to fall into, to plunge into, to be deceived, to be taken in, to fall into a trap, to be addicted to, to be deep into
to get in, to insert, to put on, to make love
